ISSUE.TITLE: Enable Path Style for S3 integration
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: this was initially discussed in https://github.com/drone/drone/pull/2600 add the following parameters: * `DRONE_S3_SKIP_VERIFY=false` * `DRONE_S3_PATH_STYLE=false` and use when setting the aws configuration in `store/logs/s3.go` ```diff &aws.Config{ Endpoint: aws.String(endpoint), + DisableSSL: aws.Bool(skipverify), + S3ForcePathStyle: aws.Bool(pathstyle), } ``` reference implementation: https://github.com/minio/cookbook/blob/master/docs/aws-sdk-for-go-with-minio.md
